from collections import Counter

c
source.a2e100f5:
#list comprehension
#can also be used for dictionaries
even_numbers=[x for x in range(5) if x%2==0]
even_numbers
source.1c6797d3:
#yield operator
#generator
def lazy_range(n):
    i=0
    while i<n:
        yield i
        i+=1
#xrange is lazy
#in python 3, range is lazy
source.745b5ea9:
#list comprehensions + parentheses
lazy_evens_below_20=(i for i in lazy_range(20) if i%2==0))
